ModMetaData.name: [42G]Glowing Bushes
ModMetaData.author: Fourtoo[42G]
ModMetaData.description:
Gives Harvestable berries a nice glow.
Strawberry Bushes Berry Bushes Healroot Ambrosia Heat resistant Ambrosia - Alpha Animals
Glow size can be changed by a simple XML edit.
This is an extension to [SYR]Glowing Healroot which I have included in this mod. https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=43449
